title: Tove Styrke is sick of the Spotify song formula
description: The Swedish star explains why she's rejected the slick, corporate Spotify sound to follow her gut.

title: How Margaret Thatcher's secret Brahms phone was invented
description: Brahms was the UK's first portable encrypted communications system designed to allow talk securely.

title: Dark skies over Presteigne helping track asteroid hazards
description: How dimming street lights is helping those tracking potential asteroid hazards heading close to Earth.

title: Irpin: Russia's reign of terror in a quiet neighbourhood near Kyiv
description: A handful of streets in a leafy town on Kyiv's doorstep were subjected to weeks of deadly occupation.

title: Buy now, pay later: Warning over use of credit cards to cover payments
description: Millions of young shoppers are borrowing money to make buy now pay later repayments, says Citizens Advice.

title: If I go back to Iran, my husband will kill me
description: Human rights activists say the number of reported so-called 'honour killings' in Iran is rising

title: Ferrari boss Mattia Binotto explains five-year journey back to top end of F1
description: Ferrari have endured a bumpy recent ride in F1 - including their worst season in 40 years. Team principal Mattia Binotto tells BBC Sport's Andrew Benson how they have made it back to the top.

title: Germany 1-1 England: Harry Kane scores 50th Three Lions goal with late penalty
description: Harry Kane scores his 50th England goal with a late penalty to earn a Nations League draw with Germany in Munich.

title: Ukraine war: Captured Britons appear in Donetsk rebel court
description: The pair, who fought for Ukraine, are accused by Russian-backed separatists of acting as mercenaries.

title: Matthew McConaughey brings dead girl's shoes to White House
description: The actor backed "responsible gun ownership" after a school shooting in his Texas hometown.

title: Ukraine War: Why I risk my life to provide aid in Ukraine
description: The British volunteers helping Ukrainians escape Russian attacks.

title: Runaway tortoise, 80, reunited with owners
description: The "adventurous" reptile, who has been a family pet for 70 years, is found after eight months.

title: San José galleon: Two new shipwrecks found off Colombian coast
description: The remains were found near the San José galleon, which was sunk by the British in 1708.

title: Emma Raducanu: Injured British number one faces race to be fit for Wimbledon
description: Emma Raducanu says she has "no idea" whether she will be fit for Wimbledon after she retired from her Nottingham Open opener against Viktorija Golubic.

title: Johnson is ally and I'm happy he's still PM, Ukraine's president says
description: Volodymyr Zelensky hails Boris Johnson as an "important ally" after the UK PM survives an attempt to oust him.

title: National Action: Nazi Alex Davies jailed 8 years, 6 months
description: He was called a "terrorist hiding in plain sight" and forced out of university due to his extremism.

title: England: Seven fans arrested in Munich - three for making a Nazi salute
description: Seven England fans were arrested in Munich on Monday, including three for making a Nazi salute, local police have confirmed.

title: Stuck Brits scramble to get home after axed flights
description: Many travellers are taking drastic action to get home after being stranded due to flight cancellations.

title: Geologist Jim Fitton jailed in Iraq 'shell shocked' over verdict
description: Jim Fitton, 66, was sentenced to 15 years for attempting to smuggle 12 stones and broken pottery.

title: Premier League to discuss ending £43m Russian TV deal at annual general meeting
description: The Premier League will discuss whether it should end its £43m six-year deal with Russian broadcaster Match TV at this week's annual general meeting.

title: Boris Johnson: What threats does he now face to his job?
description: The mood among Tory MPs suggests the PM's woes are far from over, writes Nick Eardley.

title: Johnson resigns from PGA Tour to join rival
description: Two-time major champion Dustin Johnson resigns his membership of the PGA Tour to play in the Saudi Arabian-funded LIV Golf Invitational Series.

title: Easyjet: Cardiff rugby club stuck in France to be rescued
description: Almost 60 members were due to fly home on Sunday, but a coach company is going to their rescue.

title: Love Island: Tasha Ghouri becomes show's first deaf contestant
description: The 23-year-old from North Yorkshire tells fellow contestants it is "just something cool" about her.

title: Why India is buying more Russian oil
description: Imports of cheaper Russian oil by India are continuing to rise, according to the latest data.

title: Cost to fuel a lorry is up £20,000 a year, says haulage boss
description: Customers are having to pay more for goods as truck firms pass on higher fuel prices, a freight boss says.

title: Family of British journalist missing in Amazon urges action
description: The journalist and a Brazilian indigenous expert had received threats before they disappeared.

title: Harry and Meghan share photo of Lilibet on first birthday
description: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex release an image of their daughter at a picnic they hosted in Windsor.

title: No confidence vote: What happens next for PM Boris Johnson?
description: Conservative MPs have voted on whether they want prime minister Boris Johnson to remain leader.

title: Brenda Edwards says son Jamal's death was due to cardiac arrhythmia
description: His mum Brenda says she was in a "state of shock" after finding out how her son died.

title: Boris Johnson: Time to draw a line and take country forward
description: In unusual move, Boris Johnson's opening remarks to his cabinet were filmed.

title: Brad Pitt says Angelina Jolie 'sought to inflict harm' with vineyard sale
description: The actor is suing his ex-wife for selling her stake in the French vineyard they bought together.

title: Kamila Valieva: Skating minimum age to be raised to 17 following Olympic controversy
description: The International Skating Union will raise the minimum age for competitors in senior events from 15 to 17 after the controversy surrounding Kamila Valieva at the Beijing Olympic Games.

title: Li Jiaqi: China Lipstick King sparks Tiananmen questions
description: Livestreamer Li Jiaqi is yet to reappear after an apparent reference to the massacre on his show.

title: Curlews: Hidden camera captures life of endangered birds
description: A hidden camera has been installed close to a pair of curlew nests in the Antrim Hills.

title: Emma Raducanu hints dream doubles partnership with Andy Murray could happen soon
description: British number one Emma Raducanu hints that a dream doubles partnership with Andy Murray could happen "soonish".

title: Orkney part of 'scallop discos' fishing trial
description: Scientists hope to show that modified lobster pots fitted with lights can be used to catch molluscs.

title: War in Ukraine: Wounded but eager to go back to fight
description: Ukrainian soldiers are returning from home with "horrendous" injuries often requiring prosthetics.

title: Top Gun maker Paramount sued over copyright breach
description: The lawsuit claims the film studio did not have the rights to release Top Gun: Maverick.

title: Nupur Sharma: Prophet Muhammad row deepens India’s diplomatic woes
description: A statement by a spokesperson of India's ruling party has snowballed into an international controversy.

title: Ukraine war: EU blames Russia for food crisis prompting walkout
description: Ukraine is a major exporter of grain and cooking oil but the war has cut off supplies at ports.

title: Dolly Alderton: Dating apps make insecurities worse
description: Ahead of her new TV show, the writer speaks to Newsbeat about being a modern-day agony aunt.
